name: Clavis's Part Shop
description:
A short experience for the 20-Second Game Jam:

 https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam

You are a potential new hire for Clavis's part shop. To get the job all you need to do is complete her challenge in 20 seconds. The challenge: move the parts that she requests out of the machine and into the adjacent box. How many times you must do this will depend on the difficulty you choose.

The idea for this game started with Clavis whose sexualized, muscular design began as a joke for a friend but now I've decided that I like ripped bunny girls. I also used this game to try an art style that feels more hand-drawn than what I usually do.

Sound Credits:

Sound Effects from Zapsplat: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Music by Eric Matyas: https://soundimage.org/
